result.adr_address: Petra Hryhorenka Ave, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02000
result.name: Шаурма

reviews.text:
Congratulations. I want to leave a negative review about this shawarma and about the liar who calls himself a "chef". I bought it twice with a large time interval and suffered from stomach upset for a day and a half after each use. To the question of whether it is fresh, he answers with a smile "YES". The content of the required meat component is replaced with cabbage, the sauce is mixed with yesterday's and fresh. It was only then that I began to observe how it does chemistry, because I walk past it every day in the morning and in the evening. The second time I came with the child and did not let him taste the good stuff, although the cook offered it.
Stay away - take care of your health!!!

I have been a regular customer of this outlet for over a year. I was very surprised when I found out that the rating in Google maps is 3.1.

So I decided to leave my review.

I can buy it several times a month or almost every day for half a month + for dinner.

I almost always buy medium + cheese + potatoes/corn. (I especially like the cheese here, very tasty and creamy and TUNABLE)

From experience, reading all the comments left before me, I can safely say - this is one of the most delicious in proportions and one of the most consistent in taste in Kyiv.

I'm a big shawarma fan. I tried a lot of different places. Specifically in the area of ​​Anna Akhmatova - Trostyanetskaya - Kharkov highway, I also tried a lot.

There are a lot of interesting shawarma shops made into fast foods in the spirit of Mac, etc., there are a lot of them with a special and distinctive signature taste. But for a long time, I couldn’t stop at these points.

This point for me is the standard of what should be called the shawarma STANDARD at a time when most of the points do not reach this title.

Good day!!!
As always, I buy a shoe from him !!!
It is extremely tasty!!!
It's just that I know them when the first opening point is in the transition near the Poznyaki metro from the Pyramid side.
But today something went wrong...
A completely different seller, did not do as usual...
It was not heated at all, the cheese did not melt, it was barely warm...
I think it's just a coincidence, and the next time will be as usual!!!
Knowing Talim, the owner of these points, he would not allow such a thing!!!

It was always not bad, but today they sold shawarma with a dash, maybe the guys are eating fennel on myas. This is enough once, I do not recommend it, be careful and pay attention to what you consume. Everything will be Ukraine!

Pretty good, good location, there is always a queue. The shawarma is delicious, the “chef” chefs from a sunny country make it themselves) it’s colorful, tasty, but there is a little trick: when you ask, they can’t make a mini size, they offer to take a medium one. It’s not entirely convenient: firstly, it’s more expensive, and there’s no terminal, and secondly, I can’t finish it, I leave it, it’s a pity to throw it away, and later it becomes soggy and the taste is not at all the same. So it's up to you to decide, this is purely my personal opinion))
